comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; WOW64; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

navigating deviantart.com to post comments is not possible as the reply/submit buttons won't appear.

tried to use Greasemonkey with script HTMLInsert 


Actual results:

on deviantart.com posting comments is not possible as the reply/submit buttons won't appear in FF7, this might affect other sites, just haven't encountered the issue yet.

For greasemonkey (HTMLInsert) the function simply didn't work.


Expected results:

deviantart.com buttons should appear, to allow interaction.

greasemonkey script should run, it's simply to encase a text selection in a textarea with html by using a set of predefined hotkeys, in this case a combination defined as CTRL+SHIFT+I for italics, etc.
